Name: Eagle
Review Text: A  great venue to spend your time. Because of a very cosy space thanks to the layout with three floors, with the bar centered on door-level, nicely designed. There is even a wall full covered with mirror. The atmosphere is very friendly and relaxed. There is a nice staff too!!!

Name: Eagle
Review Text: I perhaps did not see the best of this place. I went on Saturday of Pride. It was rammed and felt dangerous. The stairs are typical of Amsterdam but the crowds and the lights made them dangerous. The toilets were disgusting- overflowing â€¦

Name: Eagle
Review Text: Had a great time here during our first visit to Amsterdam. My husband and I went here and met a number of locals and tourists  a number of the locals were welcoming and entertaining. Quite a lot of good looking men. The bartender Poe (spelling) made us feel very welcomed.  Would definitely visit Eagle Amsterdam again.

Name: Eagle
Review Text: One of the worst place I went in this vacation. I saw many nice things on Twitter about this place but on Friday night is really boring. Compared to similar place is small, even compared to similar cruise ber in Italy (where we are not so â€¦

Name: Eagle
Review Text: Nice bar, sexy bartenders...but BEWARE of pick pockets down in the dark room areas. Have been picked 3x over the years at this particular bar.  They are VERY savvy and good at what they do!

New lights and sound is GREAT! I know, sometimes there can be less guys but this â€¦

Name: Eagle
Review Text: During the Amsterdam Pride we've visited "The Eagle". The barkeepers and the music are great! But the toilets are terrible! everywhere piss - not only in the toilets (in front of the toilets and on the floor) and thus it smells!

Name: Eagle
Review Text: I checked in my jacket AND my backpack with the coat check and had 6 individual bags with a gram of marijuana, in each missing.  The only one remaining is hash.  I will be back to confront the man who checked my belongings, other than that, this place was not impressive.

Name: Eagle
Review Text: Thanks so much for hosting the Meantime party. Very friendly! It was fun for my wife to see the inside and enjoy your interesting "facilities" herself!

Review Text: Never been to a place for a Â«Â after partyÂ Â» where they do not  refresh the staff , nor clean the toilets ( piles of toilet paper) and all people working in the bar are exhausted after a night shift and the coat check does not even know how to smile or communicate properly .. SAD!!

Review Text: One of my favorite places to go when in Amsterdam and my favorite Eagle I have been to. Found everyone friendly and a lot of hot men! Many memories formed here and will definitely be back again

Name: Eagle
Review Text: The days of heavy sex in Amsterdam are over. The place is becoming straight laced & ultra-conservative. Calfornia is currently the new up&coming Amsterdam, with has shops opening all over. All regulated and safer than the prelegal days. A straight sensible opinion on drugs.
